Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is an energy conversion device that produces electricity directly from fossil fuels through electrochemical reactions.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of ITSOFC hybrid system for polygenerations

Sentencas: Intermediate and low temperature SOFCs (IT/LT, 300-800 C SOFCs) are the main strains of the world SOFC R&D now.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of ITSOFC hybrid system for polygenerations

Sentencas: The exhaust gas of SOFC has high value in use.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of ITSOFC hybrid system for polygenerations

Sentencas: So SOFC is often integrated into a hybrid system with other power systems.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of ITSOFC hybrid system for polygenerations

Sentencas: Research shows that the electrical efficiency and the total efficiency of a hybrid system can be about 60% and 80% higher than an independent one.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of ITSOFC hybrid system for polygenerations

Sentencas: In this paper, the performance of intermediate temperature SOFC hybrid system was analyzed.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of ITSOFC hybrid system for polygenerations

Sentencas: Based on presenting a steady-state mathematical model of ITSOFC, the steadystate model of each designed system was presented.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of ITSOFC hybrid system for polygenerations

Sentencas: Results show that a hybrid system can achieve high efficiency.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of ITSOFC hybrid system for polygenerations

Sentencas: The results of this research can be useful in design and application for polygenerations integrated by SOFCs.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of ITSOFC hybrid system for polygenerations
